byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei welcomes completion of nuclear deal and lifting of economic sanctions, but warns Iranian government to ensure United States honors its part of deal.
lead_paragraph: In a letter to Iran’s president, the supreme leader cautiously welcomed the completion of the nuclear deal and end to economic sanctions but said the United States breaks its promises.

headline.main: Ayatollah Khamenei Warns Iran’s Government Against U.S. ‘Deceptions’
headline.print_headline: Ayatollah Warns Iran Against U.S. Deception

snippet: In a letter to Iran’s president, the supreme leader cautiously welcomed the completion of the nuclear deal and end to economic sanctions but said the United States breaks its promises.
